Package board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board Class represents the board in the Game of Life.

    Game of Life was developed by American mathematician John Conway. It is a cellular automaton that evolves turn by turn. Cells has special conditions to evolve adn to change their current state.

    Game of life has the same computational power as the Turing machine, so all algorithms could be computed in the Game of Life.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Cristian Abrante Dorta

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​()
        Default constructor of the class. It creates and empty matrix of cells.

      • Board

        public Board​(java.lang.String boardFilePath)
      throws java.io.IOException,
             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
             java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Constructor of the class. It reads and parse the specified file to create the cell board.

        The configuration file is as it follows: - int that specifies the number of rows. - int that specifies the number of columns. matrix with characters, * is used to put a dead cell, and O is used to create an alive cell.

        Example: 3 5 **O** *OOO* **O**

        Parameters:
        boardFilePath - path to the configuration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If something happens opening the file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If there is any problem with matrix characters or length.
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If number of columns or row is not valid.

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell​(int numberOfRow,
                    int numberOfColumn)
        Method that returns a certain cell specified by a position.
        Parameters:
        numberOfRow - row position from 0 to rows size - 1.
        numberOfColumn - column position form 0 to column size -1.
        Returns:
        Specified cell and null if position is not valid.

      • saveAt

        public void saveAt​(java.lang.String outFilePath)
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method that save current board into the specified file. It used the file configuration of the board.
        Parameters:
        outFilePath - file path where the board is going to be stored.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If can't open the file.

      • updateBoard

        public void updateBoard​()
        Method that updates all cell states by apliying the rules of surveillance. Each rule is specified in the cell configuration.
